TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract serializable beforefieldinit KeyedCollection`2<TKey, TItem> extends System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection`1<!TItem>
Public MustInherit Class KeyedCollection(Of TKey, TItem) Inherits Collection(Of TItem)
generic <typename TKey, typename TItem> public ref class KeyedCollection abstract : System::Collections::ObjectModel::Collection<TItem>

span.span: The type of keys in the collection.
The type of items in the collection.

summary.span: Provides the abstract base class for a collection whose keys are embedded in the values.

span.span: Provides the abstract base class for a collection whose keys are embedded in the values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會提供這兩種 o （1） 的索引式擷取和擷取接近 o （1），做為索引鍵。The class provides both O(1) indexed retrieval and keyed retrieval that approaches O(1). 它是抽象類型，或更精確地無限設定，抽象類型，因為其建構的泛型類型的每一個都是抽象的基底類別。It is an abstract type, or more accurately an infinite set of abstract types, because each of its constructed generic types is an abstract base class. 若要使用，衍生自適當的建構類型的集合型別。To use , derive your collection type from the appropriate constructed type. 類別為基礎的集合之間的混合體泛型介面和集合為基礎泛型介面。The class is a hybrid between a collection based on the generic interface and a collection based on the generic interface. 要根據集合泛型介面，是索引的項目清單。Like collections based on the generic interface, is an indexed list of items. 要根據集合泛型介面，具有每個項目相關聯的索引鍵。Like collections based on the generic interface, has a key associated with each element. 不同於字典的項目不是索引鍵/值組; 相反地，整個項目值，然後再將金鑰內嵌在值。Unlike dictionaries, an element of is not a key/value pair; instead, the entire element is the value and the key is embedded within the value. 例如，集合的項目衍生自`KeyedCollection\`(`KeyedCollection(Of String, String)`在 Visual Basic 中) 可能是 「 John Doe Jr。 」For example, an element of a collection derived from `KeyedCollection\` (`KeyedCollection(Of String, String)` in Visual Basic) might be "John Doe Jr." 其中的值是"John Doe Jr。 」where the value is "John Doe Jr." 機碼為"Doe";包含整數索引鍵的員工記錄的集合無法衍生自或`KeyedCollection\`。and the key is "Doe"; or a collection of employee records containing integer keys could be derived from `KeyedCollection\`. 抽象方法從項目擷取索引鍵。The abstract method extracts the key from the element. 根據預設，包含查閱字典，其中您可以取得與屬性。By default, the includes a lookup dictionary that you can obtain with the property. 當項目加入，項目索引鍵是一次擷取並儲存以加速搜尋查閱字典中。When an item is added to the , the item's key is extracted once and saved in the lookup dictionary for faster searches. 藉由指定字典建立臨界值，當您建立覆寫這個行為。This behavior is overridden by specifying a dictionary creation threshold when you create the . 第一次的元素數目超過臨界值時，會建立查閱字典。The lookup dictionary is created the first time the number of elements exceeds that threshold. 如果您指定-1 做為臨界值時，永遠不會建立查閱字典。If you specify –1 as the threshold, the lookup dictionary is never created. > [!NOTE] > 使用內部的查閱字典時，其中包含集合中的所有項目參考如果`TItem`是參考型別，或如果在集合中的所有項目的複製`TItem`是實值類型。When the internal lookup dictionary is used, it contains references to all the items in the collection if `TItem` is a reference type, or copies of all the items in the collection if `TItem` is a value type. 因此，查閱字典可能不適合使用如果`TItem`是實值類型。Thus, using the lookup dictionary may not be appropriate if `TItem` is a value type. 您可以使用來存取依其索引或索引鍵的項目屬性。You can access an item by its index or key by using the property. 您可以加入項目沒有索引鍵，但後續可以只依索引存取這些項目。You can add items without a key, but these items can subsequently be accessed only by index. ## Examples 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。This section contains two code examples. 第一個範例顯示的最小的程式碼，才能衍生自，並示範繼承的方法。The first example shows the minimum code required to derive from , and demonstrates many of the inherited methods. 第二個範例示範如何覆寫的受保護的方法提供自訂行為。The second example shows how to override the protected methods of to provide custom behavior. **範例 1****Example 1** 這個程式碼範例顯示的最小的程式碼所需衍生集合類別，從： 覆寫方法並提供的公用建構函式委派至基底類別建構函式。This code example shows the minimum code necessary to derive a collection class from : overriding the method and providing a public constructor that delegates to a base class constructor. 程式碼範例也示範的許多屬性和方法繼承自和類別。The code example also demonstrates many of the properties and methods inherited from and classes. `SimpleOrder`類別是非常簡單的必要條件清單，其中包含`OrderItem`物件，其中每一個都代表訂單中行項目。The `SimpleOrder` class is a very simple requisition list that contains `OrderItem` objects, each of which represents a line item in the order. 索引鍵`OrderItem`是不變，衍生自類別的一個重要考量。The key of `OrderItem` is immutable, an important consideration for classes that derive from . 程式碼範例會使用可變動的金鑰，請參閱。For a code example that uses mutable keys, see . [!code-cpp[KeyedCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollection/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[KeyedCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollection/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[KeyedCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollection/VB/source.vb#1)] **範例 2****Example 2** 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫的受保護， ， ，和方法，以提供的自訂行為， ，和方法，以及設定預設屬性 （C# 中為索引子）。The following code example shows how to override the protected , , , and methods, to provide custom behavior for the , , and methods, and for setting the default property (the indexer in C#). 在此範例中提供的自訂行為是名為將通知事件`Changed`，其引發的每個覆寫方法的結尾。The custom behavior provided in this example is a notification event named `Changed`, which is raised at the end of each of the overridden methods. 程式碼範例會建立`SimpleOrder`類別，衍生自代表簡單的訂單。The code example creates the `SimpleOrder` class, which derives from and represents a simple order form. 訂購表單包含`OrderItem`物件代表的項目排序。The order form contains `OrderItem` objects representing items ordered. 程式碼範例也會建立`SimpleOrderChangedEventArgs`類別包含事件資訊，以及列舉來識別變更的類型。The code example also creates a `SimpleOrderChangedEventArgs` class to contain the event information, and an enumeration to identify the type of change. 程式碼範例示範自訂行為藉由在呼叫的屬性和方法在衍生類別`Main`方法`Demo`類別。The code example demonstrates the custom behavior by calling the properties and methods of the derived class, in the `Main` method of the `Demo` class. 這個程式碼範例會使用不可變的索引鍵的物件。This code example uses objects with immutable keys. 程式碼範例會使用可變動的金鑰，請參閱。For a code example that uses mutable keys, see . [!code-cpp[KeyedCollection2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollection2/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[KeyedCollection2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollection2/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[KeyedCollection2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollection2/vb/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks A建立與這個建構函式會使用預設的泛型等號比較子的索引鍵，類型取自。A created with this constructor uses the default generic equality comparer for the type of the key, obtained from . 若要指定不同的泛型等號比較子，請使用建構函式或建構函式。To specify a different generic equality comparer, use the constructor or the constructor. 根據預設，包含第一個項目加入時，會建立查閱字典。By default, the includes a lookup dictionary that is created when the first item is added. 當項目加入，項目索引鍵是一次擷取並儲存以加速搜尋查閱字典中。When an item is added to the , the item's key is extracted once and saved in the lookup dictionary for faster searches. 使用覆寫這個行為建構函式，並指定字典建立臨界值。This behavior can be overridden by using the constructor and specifying a dictionary creation threshold. > [!NOTE] > 因為類別是抽象的 (`MustInherit`在 Visual Basic 中)，您必須衍生自它，才能使用它。Because the class is abstract (`MustInherit` in Visual Basic), you must derive from it in order to use it. 在您的衍生類型的建構函式，呼叫適當建構函式。In the constructor for your derived type, call the appropriate constructor. 您不需要公開的相等比較子或字典建立臨界值，在您建構函式等的功能。It is not necessary to expose functionality like the equality comparer or the dictionary creation threshold in your constructors. 這個建構函式是 o （1） 運算。This constructor is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 這個程式碼範例顯示的最小的程式碼所需衍生集合類別，從： 覆寫方法並提供的公用建構函式委派至基底類別建構函式。This code example shows the minimum code necessary to derive a collection class from : overriding the method and providing a public constructor that delegates to a base class constructor. 程式碼範例也示範的許多屬性和方法繼承自和類別。The code example also demonstrates many of the properties and methods inherited from and classes. `SimpleOrder`類別是非常簡單的必要條件清單，其中包含`OrderItem`物件，其中每一個都代表訂單中行項目。The `SimpleOrder` class is a very simple requisition list that contains `OrderItem` objects, each of which represents a line item in the order. 索引鍵`OrderItem`是不變，衍生自類別的一個重要考量。The key of `OrderItem` is immutable, an important consideration for classes that derive from . 程式碼範例會使用可變動的金鑰，請參閱。For a code example that uses mutable keys, see . remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，包含第一個項目加入時，會建立查閱字典。By default, the includes a lookup dictionary that is created when the first item is added. 當項目加入，項目索引鍵是一次擷取並儲存以加速搜尋查閱字典中。When an item is added to the , the item's key is extracted once and saved in the lookup dictionary for faster searches. 使用覆寫這個行為建構函式，並指定字典建立臨界值。This behavior can be overridden by using the constructor and specifying a dictionary creation threshold. > [!NOTE] > 因為類別是抽象的 (`MustInherit`在 Visual Basic 中)，您必須衍生自它，才能使用它。Because the class is abstract (`MustInherit` in Visual Basic), you must derive from it in order to use it. 在您的衍生類型的建構函式，呼叫適當建構函式。In the constructor for your derived type, call the appropriate constructor. 您不需要公開的相等比較子或字典建立臨界值，在您建構函式等的功能。It is not necessary to expose functionality like the equality comparer or the dictionary creation threshold in your constructors. 這個建構函式是 o （1） 運算。This constructor is an O(1) operation.

param.name: comparer
param.span: The implementation of the generic interface to use when comparing keys, or to use the default equality comparer for the type of the key, obtained from .

span.span: The implementation of the generic interface to use when comparing keys, or to use the default equality comparer for the type of the key, obtained from .

param.name: dictionaryCreationThreshold
param.span: The number of elements the collection can hold without creating a lookup dictionary (0 creates the lookup dictionary when the first item is added), or –1 to specify that a lookup dictionary is never created.

summary.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that uses the specified equality comparer and creates a lookup dictionary when the specified threshold is exceeded.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that uses the specified equality comparer and creates a lookup dictionary when the specified threshold is exceeded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，包含第一個項目加入時，會建立查閱字典。By default, the includes a lookup dictionary that is created when the first item is added. 當項目加入，項目索引鍵是一次擷取並儲存以加速搜尋查閱字典中。When an item is added to the , the item's key is extracted once and saved in the lookup dictionary for faster searches. 這個建構函式可讓您覆寫行為。This constructor allows you to override that behavior. 指定建立字典，當加入第一個項目 0、 1 建立字典，當加入第二個元素，等等。Specify 0 to create the dictionary when the first element is added, 1 to create the dictionary when the second element is added, and so on. 如果您指定-1 做為臨界值時，永遠不會建立查閱字典。If you specify –1 as the threshold, the lookup dictionary is never created. 非常小的集合中擷取速度查閱字典所提供的改進可能不值得額外字典所需的記憶體。For very small collections the improvement in retrieval speed provided by the lookup dictionary might not be worth the extra memory required by the dictionary. 設定臨界值，可讓您決定何時要做出取捨。Setting a threshold allows you to decide when to make that tradeoff. > [!NOTE] > 因為類別是抽象的 (`MustInherit`在 Visual Basic 中)，您必須衍生自它，才能使用它。Because the class is abstract (`MustInherit` in Visual Basic), you must derive from it in order to use it. 在您的衍生類型的建構函式，呼叫適當建構函式。In the constructor for your derived type, call the appropriate constructor. 您不需要公開的相等比較子或字典建立臨界值，在您建構函式等的功能。It is not necessary to expose functionality like the equality comparer or the dictionary creation threshold in your constructors. 這個建構函式是 o （1） 運算。This constructor is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫的受保護， ， ，和方法，以提供的自訂行為， ，和方法，以及設定預設屬性 （C# 中為索引子）。The following code example shows how to override the protected , , , and methods, to provide custom behavior for the , , and methods, and for setting the default property (the indexer in C#). 在此範例中提供的自訂行為是名為將通知事件`Changed`，其引發的每個覆寫方法的結尾。The custom behavior provided in this example is a notification event named `Changed`, which is raised at the end of each of the overridden methods. 此程式碼範例會使用與臨界值為 0 時，建構函式，讓內部字典會建立第一次的物件會加入至集合。The code example uses the constructor with a threshold of 0, so that the internal dictionary is created the first time an object is added to the collection. 程式碼範例會建立`SimpleOrder`類別，衍生自代表簡單的訂單。The code example creates the `SimpleOrder` class, which derives from and represents a simple order form. 訂購表單包含`OrderItem`物件代表的項目排序。The order form contains `OrderItem` objects representing items ordered. 程式碼範例也會建立`SimpleOrderChangedEventArgs`類別包含事件資訊，以及列舉來識別變更的類型。The code example also creates a `SimpleOrderChangedEventArgs` class to contain the event information, and an enumeration to identify the type of change. 程式碼範例示範自訂行為藉由在呼叫的屬性和方法在衍生類別`Main`方法`Demo`類別。The code example demonstrates the custom behavior by calling the properties and methods of the derived class, in the `Main` method of the `Demo` class. 這個程式碼範例會使用不可變的索引鍵的物件。This code example uses objects with immutable keys. 程式碼範例會使用可變動的金鑰，請參閱。For a code example that uses mutable keys, see . [!code-cpp[KeyedCollection2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollection2/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[KeyedCollection2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollection2/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[KeyedCollection2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollection2/vb/source.vb#1)]

param.name: item

summary.span: Changes the key associated with the specified element in the lookup dictionary.

span.span: Changes the key associated with the specified element in the lookup dictionary.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法不會修改金鑰內嵌在`item`; 它只會取代查閱字典中儲存的索引鍵。This method does not modify the key embedded in `item`; it simply replaces the key saved in the lookup dictionary. 因此，如果`newKey`內嵌在索引鍵不同`item`，您無法存取`item`使用所傳回之金鑰。Therefore, if `newKey` is different from the key that is embedded in `item`, you cannot access `item` by using the key returned by . 這個方法不會執行任何動作如果沒有查閱字典。This method does nothing if the does not have a lookup dictionary. 在每個索引鍵必須是唯一的。Every key in a must be unique. 金鑰不能`null`。A key cannot be `null`. 這個方法是一種 o （1） 運算。This method is an O(1) operation. ## 實作者注意事項Notes for Implementers 修改機碼內嵌在項目之前，您必須呼叫這個方法，以更新查閱字典中的索引鍵。Before modifying the key embedded in an item, you must call this method to update the key in the lookup dictionary. 如果字典建立臨界值為 – 1，則不需要呼叫這個方法。If the dictionary creation threshold is –1, calling this method is not necessary. 不會公開方法為衍生類別的公用方法。Do not expose the method as a public method of a derived class. 不當使用這個方法會將查閱字典同步的項目索引鍵。Misuse of this method puts the lookup dictionary out of sync with item keys. 例如，若要設定機碼`null`並再將它設定為另一個值將多個索引鍵的項目加入至查閱字典。For example, setting the key to `null` and then setting it to another value adds multiple keys for an item to the lookup dictionary. 公開此方法在內部以允許可變動的項目索引鍵： 索引鍵的項目變更時，這個方法用來變更查閱字典中的索引鍵。Expose this method internally to allow mutable item keys: When the key for an item changes, this method is used to change the key in the lookup dictionary. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫的受保護方法，以支援可變動索引鍵，以及如何覆寫的受保護， ， ，和方法來維護索引鍵的完整性和集合中。The following code example shows how to override the protected method to support mutable keys, and how to override the protected , , , and methods to maintain the integrity of the keys and the collection. 程式碼範例會建立`MutableKeys`集合，衍生自，而`MutableKey`類別。The code example creates the `MutableKeys` collection, which derives from , and the `MutableKey` class. `MutableKey`類別具有可設定`Key`屬性。The `MutableKey` class has a settable `Key` property. 新的金鑰是指派給屬性時，會呼叫屬性 setter `internal` (`Friend`在 Visual Basic 中)`ChangeKey`方法來測試是否與現有的索引鍵衝突的新索引鍵的集合。When a new key is assigned to the property, the property setter calls the `internal` (`Friend` in Visual Basic) `ChangeKey` method of the collection to test whether the new key would conflict with an existing key. 如果是的話，會擲回例外狀況，且屬性值不會變更。If so, an exception is thrown and the property value is not changed. 為了維護之間的連線`MutableKey`物件和`MutableKeys`集合，並防止物件被插入兩個集合`MutableKey`類別具有`internal`(`Friend`在 Visual Basic 中) `Collection`欄位。In order to maintain the connection between a `MutableKey` object and the `MutableKeys` collection and to prevent an object from being inserted into two collections, the `MutableKey` class has an `internal` (`Friend` in Visual Basic) `Collection` field. 這個欄位由受保護的方法，提供自訂行為中新增和移除項目集合，例如維護方法。This field is maintained by the protected methods that provide custom behavior for adding and removing items from the collection, such as the method. 項目加入至集合中，移除項目時，清除時，會設定欄位。The field is set when the item is added to a collection and cleared when the item is removed. [!code-csharp[KeyedCollectionMutable#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollectionMutable/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[KeyedCollectionMutable#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollectionMutable/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void ClearItems() cil managed

span.span: Removes all elements from the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果沒有查閱字典，這個方法會清除它，但不會刪除。If there is a lookup dictionary, this method clears it but does not delete it. 如果項目數目已超過字典建立臨界值和是使用查閱字典，它將會繼續使用查閱字典，即使項目數目會再次低於閾值。If the number of elements has exceeded the dictionary creation threshold and the is using a lookup dictionary, it will continue to use a lookup dictionary even though the number of elements is again under the threshold. 這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . ## 實作者注意事項Notes for Implementers 覆寫這個方法以提供自訂的行為繼承自方法泛型類別。Override this method to provide customized behavior for the method, inherited from the generic class. 呼叫這個方法，以清除基礎的集合，並清除查閱字典的基底類別實作。Call the base class implementation of this method to clear the underlying collection and to clear the lookup dictionary. ## Examples 本章節包含兩個程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法，以清除集合中的所有物件提供自訂行為。This section contains two code examples that demonstrate overriding the method to provide custom behavior for clearing all objects from the collection. 第一個範例會加入自訂通知事件，第二個物件的集合提供支援可變動索引鍵。The first example adds a custom notification event and the second provides support for a collection of objects with mutable keys. 範例 1Example 1 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫的受保護， ， ，和方法，以提供的自訂行為， ，和方法，以及設定預設屬性 （C# 中為索引子）。The following code example shows how to override the protected , , , and methods, to provide custom behavior for the , , and methods, and for setting the default property (the indexer in C#). 在此範例中提供的自訂行為是名為將通知事件`Changed`，其引發的每個覆寫方法的結尾。The custom behavior provided in this example is a notification event named `Changed`, which is raised at the end of each of the overridden methods. 程式碼範例會建立`SimpleOrder`類別，衍生自代表簡單的訂單。The code example creates the `SimpleOrder` class, which derives from and represents a simple order form. 訂購表單包含`OrderItem`物件代表的項目排序。The order form contains `OrderItem` objects representing items ordered. 程式碼範例也會建立`SimpleOrderChangedEventArgs`類別包含事件資訊，以及列舉來識別變更的類型。The code example also creates a `SimpleOrderChangedEventArgs` class to contain the event information, and an enumeration to identify the type of change. 程式碼範例示範自訂行為藉由在呼叫的屬性和方法在衍生類別`Main`方法`Demo`類別。The code example demonstrates the custom behavior by calling the properties and methods of the derived class, in the `Main` method of the `Demo` class. 這個程式碼範例會使用不可變的索引鍵的物件。This code example uses objects with immutable keys. 程式碼範例會使用可變動的金鑰，請參閱。For a code example that uses mutable keys, see . [!code-cpp[KeyedCollection2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollection2/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[KeyedCollection2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollection2/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[KeyedCollection2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollection2/vb/source.vb#1)] 範例 2Example 2 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫的受保護方法，以支援可變動索引鍵，以及如何覆寫的受保護， ， ，和方法來維護索引鍵的完整性和集合中。The following code example shows how to override the protected method to support mutable keys, and how to override the protected , , , and methods to maintain the integrity of the keys and the collection. 程式碼範例會建立`MutableKeys`集合，衍生自，而`MutableKey`類別。The code example creates the `MutableKeys` collection, which derives from , and the `MutableKey` class. `MutableKey`類別具有可設定`Key`屬性。The `MutableKey` class has a settable `Key` property. 新的金鑰是指派給屬性時，會呼叫屬性 setter `internal` (`Friend`在 Visual Basic 中)`ChangeKey`方法來測試是否與現有的索引鍵衝突的新索引鍵的集合。When a new key is assigned to the property, the property setter calls the `internal` (`Friend` in Visual Basic) `ChangeKey` method of the collection to test whether the new key would conflict with an existing key. 如果是的話，會擲回例外狀況，且屬性值不會變更。If so, an exception is thrown and the property value is not changed. 為了維護之間的連線`MutableKey`物件和`MutableKeys`集合，並防止物件被插入兩個集合`MutableKey`類別具有`internal`(`Friend`在 Visual Basic 中) `Collection`欄位。In order to maintain the connection between a `MutableKey` object and the `MutableKeys` collection and to prevent an object from being inserted into two collections, the `MutableKey` class has an `internal` (`Friend` in Visual Basic) `Collection` field. 這個欄位由受保護的方法，提供自訂行為中新增和移除項目集合，例如維護方法。This field is maintained by the protected methods that provide custom behavior for adding and removing items from the collection, such as the method. 項目加入至集合中，移除項目時，清除時，會設定欄位。The field is set when the item is added to a collection and cleared when the item is removed. [!code-csharp[KeyedCollectionMutable#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollectionMutable/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[KeyedCollectionMutable#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollectionMutable/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果查閱字典，`key`用來搜尋的字典。If the has a lookup dictionary, `key` is used to search the dictionary. 如果您沒有查閱字典，每個項目的索引鍵會擷取使用方法並使用指定的金鑰進行比較。If there is no lookup dictionary, the key of each element is extracted using the method and compared with the specified key. 這個方法是 o （1） 運算，如果查閱字典; 否則為 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是。This method is an O(1) operation if the has a lookup dictionary; otherwise it is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . ## Examples 這個程式碼範例顯示的最小的程式碼所需衍生集合類別，從： 覆寫方法並提供的公用建構函式委派至基底類別建構函式。This code example shows the minimum code necessary to derive a collection class from : overriding the method and providing a public constructor that delegates to a base class constructor. 程式碼範例也示範的許多屬性和方法繼承自和類別。The code example also demonstrates many of the properties and methods inherited from and classes. `SimpleOrder`類別是非常簡單的必要條件清單，其中包含`OrderItem`物件，其中每一個都代表訂單中行項目。The `SimpleOrder` class is a very simple requisition list that contains `OrderItem` objects, each of which represents a line item in the order. 索引鍵`OrderItem`是不變，衍生自類別的一個重要考量。The key of `OrderItem` is immutable, an important consideration for classes that derive from . 程式碼範例會使用可變動的金鑰，請參閱。For a code example that uses mutable keys, see . remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，包含第一個項目加入時，會建立查閱字典。By default, the includes a lookup dictionary that is created when the first item is added. 當項目加入，項目索引鍵是一次擷取並儲存以加速搜尋查閱字典中。When an item is added to the , the item's key is extracted once and saved in the lookup dictionary for faster searches. 使用覆寫這個行為建構函式，並指定字典建立臨界值。This behavior can be overridden by using the constructor and specifying a dictionary creation threshold. 擷取這個屬性的值是一種 O(1) 運算。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫的受保護方法，以支援可變動索引鍵，以及如何覆寫的受保護， ， ，和方法來維護索引鍵的完整性和集合中。The following code example shows how to override the protected method to support mutable keys, and how to override the protected , , , and methods to maintain the integrity of the keys and the collection. 程式碼範例會建立`MutableKeys`集合，衍生自，而`MutableKey`類別。The code example creates the `MutableKeys` collection, which derives from , and the `MutableKey` class. `MutableKey`類別具有可設定`Key`屬性。The `MutableKey` class has a settable `Key` property. 新的金鑰是指派給屬性時，會呼叫屬性 setter `internal` (`Friend`在 Visual Basic 中)`ChangeKey`方法來測試是否與現有的索引鍵衝突的新索引鍵的集合。When a new key is assigned to the property, the property setter calls the `internal` (`Friend` in Visual Basic) `ChangeKey` method of the collection to test whether the new key would conflict with an existing key. 如果是的話，會擲回例外狀況，且屬性值不會變更。If so, an exception is thrown and the property value is not changed. 為了維護之間的連線`MutableKey`物件和`MutableKeys`集合，並防止物件被插入兩個集合`MutableKey`類別具有`internal`(`Friend`在 Visual Basic 中) `Collection`欄位。In order to maintain the connection between a `MutableKey` object and the `MutableKeys` collection and to prevent an object from being inserted into two collections, the `MutableKey` class has an `internal` (`Friend` in Visual Basic) `Collection` field. 這個欄位由受保護的方法，提供自訂行為中新增和移除項目集合，例如維護方法。This field is maintained by the protected methods that provide custom behavior for adding and removing items from the collection, such as the method. 項目加入至集合中，移除項目時，清除時，會設定欄位。The field is set when the item is added to a collection and cleared when the item is removed. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果查閱字典中的機碼會內嵌在索引鍵不同`item`，您無法存取`item`使用所傳回之金鑰。If the key in the lookup dictionary is different from the key that is embedded in `item`, you cannot access `item` by using the key returned by . 您可以實作此方法以傳回`null`包含沒有金鑰的項目集合，在此情況下存取的項目可以是僅由其索引。You can implement this method to return `null` for a collection that contains items without keys, in which case the items can be accessed only by their index. 這個方法是一種 o （1） 運算。This method is an O(1) operation. ## 實作者注意事項Notes for Implementers 您必須覆寫這個方法以提供一種方式，從字典中的項目擷取索引鍵的字典。You must override this method to provide the dictionary with a way to extract keys from items in the dictionary. 在內部呼叫這個方法。This method is called internally. 您不需要它設為公用。It is not necessary for it to be public. ## Examples 這個程式碼範例顯示的最小的程式碼所需衍生集合類別，從： 覆寫方法並提供的公用建構函式委派至基底類別建構函式。This code example shows the minimum code necessary to derive a collection class from : overriding the method and providing a public constructor that delegates to a base class constructor. 程式碼範例也示範的許多屬性和方法繼承自和類別。The code example also demonstrates many of the properties and methods inherited from and classes. `SimpleOrder`類別是非常簡單的必要條件清單，其中包含`OrderItem`物件，其中每一個都代表訂單中行項目。The `SimpleOrder` class is a very simple requisition list that contains `OrderItem` objects, each of which represents a line item in the order. 索引鍵`OrderItem`是不變，衍生自類別的一個重要考量。The key of `OrderItem` is immutable, an important consideration for classes that derive from . 程式碼範例會使用可變動的金鑰，請參閱。For a code example that uses mutable keys, see . 實作者注意事項Notes for Implementers 覆寫這個方法以提供自訂的行為和方法繼承自泛型類別。Override this method to provide customized behavior for the and methods, inherited from the generic class. 呼叫這個方法將項目插入基礎的集合，並更新查閱字典的基底類別實作。Call the base class implementation of this method to insert the item into the underlying collection and to update the lookup dictionary. ## Examples 本章節包含兩個程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法，以加入或插入至集合的物件提供自訂行為。This section contains two code examples that demonstrate overriding the method to provide custom behavior for adding or inserting objects into the collection. 第一個範例會加入自訂通知事件，第二個物件的集合提供支援可變動索引鍵。The first example adds a custom notification event and the second provides support for a collection of objects with mutable keys. 範例 1Example 1 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫的受保護， ， ，和方法，以提供的自訂行為， ，和方法，以及設定預設屬性 （C# 中為索引子）。The following code example shows how to override the protected , , , and methods, to provide custom behavior for the , , and methods, and for setting the default property (the indexer in C#). 在此範例中提供的自訂行為是名為將通知事件`Changed`，其引發的每個覆寫方法的結尾。The custom behavior provided in this example is a notification event named `Changed`, which is raised at the end of each of the overridden methods. 程式碼範例會建立`SimpleOrder`類別，衍生自代表簡單的訂單。The code example creates the `SimpleOrder` class, which derives from and represents a simple order form. 訂購表單包含`OrderItem`物件代表的項目排序。The order form contains `OrderItem` objects representing items ordered. 程式碼範例也會建立`SimpleOrderChangedEventArgs`類別包含事件資訊，以及列舉來識別變更的類型。The code example also creates a `SimpleOrderChangedEventArgs` class to contain the event information, and an enumeration to identify the type of change. 程式碼範例示範自訂行為藉由在呼叫的屬性和方法在衍生類別`Main`方法`Demo`類別。The code example demonstrates the custom behavior by calling the properties and methods of the derived class, in the `Main` method of the `Demo` class. 這個程式碼範例會使用不可變的索引鍵的物件。This code example uses objects with immutable keys. 程式碼範例會使用可變動的金鑰，請參閱。For a code example that uses mutable keys, see . [!code-cpp[KeyedCollection2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollection2/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[KeyedCollection2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollection2/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[KeyedCollection2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollection2/vb/source.vb#1)] 範例 2Example 2 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫的受保護方法，以支援可變動索引鍵，以及如何覆寫的受保護， ， ，和方法來維護索引鍵的完整性和集合中。The following code example shows how to override the protected method to support mutable keys, and how to override the protected , , , and methods to maintain the integrity of the keys and the collection. 程式碼範例會建立`MutableKeys`集合，衍生自，而`MutableKey`類別。The code example creates the `MutableKeys` collection, which derives from , and the `MutableKey` class. `MutableKey`類別具有可設定`Key`屬性。The `MutableKey` class has a settable `Key` property. 新的金鑰是指派給屬性時，會呼叫屬性 setter `internal` (`Friend`在 Visual Basic 中)`ChangeKey`方法來測試是否與現有的索引鍵衝突的新索引鍵的集合。When a new key is assigned to the property, the property setter calls the `internal` (`Friend` in Visual Basic) `ChangeKey` method of the collection to test whether the new key would conflict with an existing key. 如果是的話，會擲回例外狀況，且屬性值不會變更。If so, an exception is thrown and the property value is not changed. 為了維護之間的連線`MutableKey`物件和`MutableKeys`集合，並防止物件被插入兩個集合`MutableKey`類別具有`internal`(`Friend`在 Visual Basic 中) `Collection`欄位。In order to maintain the connection between a `MutableKey` object and the `MutableKeys` collection and to prevent an object from being inserted into two collections, the `MutableKey` class has an `internal` (`Friend` in Visual Basic) `Collection` field. 這個欄位由受保護的方法，提供自訂行為中新增和移除項目集合，例如維護方法。This field is maintained by the protected methods that provide custom behavior for adding and removing items from the collection, such as the method. 項目加入至集合中，移除項目時，清除時，會設定欄位。The field is set when the item is added to a collection and cleared when the item is removed. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會提供可以使用下列語法存取集合中的特定元素的能力： `myCollection[key]` (`myCollection(key)`在 Visual Basic 中)。This property provides the ability to access a specific element in the collection by using the following syntax: `myCollection[key]` (`myCollection(key)` in Visual Basic). > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性是不同於繼承屬性，取得與設定項目依數字索引。This property is distinct from the inherited property, which gets and sets elements by numeric index. 不過，如果`TKey`的型別，這個屬性可以繼承的屬性。However, if `TKey` is of type , this property masks the inherited property. 在此情況下，您可以存取繼承的屬性轉型與其基底類型。In that case, you can access the inherited property by casting the to its base type. 例如， `KeyedCollection` (`KeyedCollection(Of Integer, MyType)`在 Visual Basic 中`KeyedCollection`c + + 中) 可以轉換成`Collection`(`Collection(Of MyType)`在 Visual Basic 中`Collection`c + + 中)。For example, `KeyedCollection` (`KeyedCollection(Of Integer, MyType)` in Visual Basic, `KeyedCollection` in C++) can be cast to `Collection` (`Collection(Of MyType)` in Visual Basic, `Collection` in C++). 如果查閱字典，`key`用來從字典中擷取的項目。If the has a lookup dictionary, `key` is used to retrieve the element from the dictionary. 如果您沒有查閱字典，每個項目的索引鍵會擷取使用方法並使用指定的金鑰進行比較。If there is no lookup dictionary, the key of each element is extracted using the method and compared with the specified key. C# 語言使用關鍵字來定義索引，而不必實作屬性。The C# language uses the keyword to define the indexers instead of implementing the property. Visual Basic 會將 實作為預設屬性，這樣會提供相同的索引功能。Visual Basic implements as a default property, which provides the same indexing functionality. 擷取這個屬性的值是一種 o （1） 運算，如果查閱字典; 否則為 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation if the has a lookup dictionary; otherwise it is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . ## Examples 這個程式碼範例顯示的最小的程式碼所需衍生集合類別，從： 覆寫方法並提供的公用建構函式委派至基底類別建構函式。This code example shows the minimum code necessary to derive a collection class from : overriding the method and providing a public constructor that delegates to a base class constructor. 程式碼範例也示範的許多屬性和方法繼承自和類別。The code example also demonstrates many of the properties and methods inherited from and classes. 程式碼範例會呼叫兩者屬性是唯讀的而且索引鍵，以擷取和屬性，這是可設定且依索引擷取。The code example calls both the property, which is read-only and retrieves by key, and the property, which is settable and retrieves by index. 它示範如何存取第二個屬性，當將衍生集合中的物件具有整數索引鍵，區別整數索引擷取。It shows how to access the latter property when the objects in the derived collection have integer keys, indistinguishable from the integers used for indexed retrieval. `SimpleOrder`類別是非常簡單的必要條件清單，其中包含`OrderItem`物件，其中每一個都代表訂單中行項目。The `SimpleOrder` class is a very simple requisition list that contains `OrderItem` objects, each of which represents a line item in the order. 索引鍵`OrderItem`是不變，衍生自類別的一個重要考量。The key of `OrderItem` is immutable, an important consideration for classes that derive from . 程式碼範例會使用可變動的金鑰，請參閱。For a code example that uses mutable keys, see . [!code-cpp[KeyedCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollection/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[KeyedCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollection/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[KeyedCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollection/VB/source.vb#1)]

exception.span: An element with the specified key does not exist in the collection.

span.span: An element with the specified key does not exist in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 元素索引鍵也會移除從查閱字典。The key of the element is also removed from the lookup dictionary. 如果項目數目已超過字典建立臨界值和是使用查閱字典，它將會繼續使用查閱字典，即使項目數目會再次低於閾值。If the number of elements has exceeded the dictionary creation threshold and the is using a lookup dictionary, it will continue to use a lookup dictionary even though the number of elements is again under the threshold. > [!NOTE] > 若要自訂此方法的行為，請覆寫方法。To customize the behavior of this method, override the method. 這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . ## Examples 這個程式碼範例顯示的最小的程式碼所需衍生集合類別，從： 覆寫方法並提供的公用建構函式委派至基底類別建構函式。This code example shows the minimum code necessary to derive a collection class from : overriding the method and providing a public constructor that delegates to a base class constructor. 程式碼範例也示範的許多屬性和方法繼承自和類別。The code example also demonstrates many of the properties and methods inherited from and classes. 此範例示範方法繼承自，以移除項目具有指定索引鍵，以及和方法繼承自，這分別移除物件和索引。The example demonstrates method inherited from , which removes the item with a specified key, and also the and methods inherited from , which remove by object and by index respectively. `SimpleOrder`類別是非常簡單的必要條件清單，其中包含`OrderItem`物件，其中每一個都代表訂單中行項目。The `SimpleOrder` class is a very simple requisition list that contains `OrderItem` objects, each of which represents a line item in the order. 索引鍵`OrderItem`是不變，衍生自類別的一個重要考量。The key of `OrderItem` is immutable, an important consideration for classes that derive from . 程式碼範例會使用可變動的金鑰，請參閱。For a code example that uses mutable keys, see . [!code-cpp[KeyedCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollection/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[KeyedCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollection/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[KeyedCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollection/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 元素索引鍵也會移除從查閱字典。The key of the element is also removed from the lookup dictionary. 如果項目數目已超過字典建立臨界值和是使用查閱字典，它將會繼續使用查閱字典，即使項目數目會再次低於閾值。If the number of elements has exceeded the dictionary creation threshold and the is using a lookup dictionary, it will continue to use a lookup dictionary even though the number of elements is again under the threshold. 這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . ## 實作者注意事項Notes for Implementers 覆寫這個方法以提供自訂的行為和方法繼承自泛型類別，而方法。Override this method to provide customized behavior for the and methods, inherited from the generic class, and the method. 呼叫這個方法，從基礎集合移除的項目，並更新查閱字典的基底類別實作。Call the base class implementation of this method to remove the item from the underlying collection and to update the lookup dictionary. ## Examples 本章節包含兩個程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法，以從集合移除的物件提供自訂行為。This section contains two code examples that demonstrate overriding the method to provide custom behavior for removing objects from the collection. 第一個範例會加入自訂通知事件，第二個物件的集合提供支援可變動索引鍵。The first example adds a custom notification event and the second provides support for a collection of objects with mutable keys. 範例 1Example 1 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫的受保護， ， ，和方法，以提供的自訂行為， ，和方法，以及設定預設屬性 （C# 中為索引子）。The following code example shows how to override the protected , , , and methods, to provide custom behavior for the , , and methods, and for setting the default property (the indexer in C#). 在此範例中提供的自訂行為是名為將通知事件`Changed`，其引發的每個覆寫方法的結尾。The custom behavior provided in this example is a notification event named `Changed`, which is raised at the end of each of the overridden methods. 程式碼範例會建立`SimpleOrder`類別，衍生自代表簡單的訂單。The code example creates the `SimpleOrder` class, which derives from and represents a simple order form. 訂購表單包含`OrderItem`物件代表的項目排序。The order form contains `OrderItem` objects representing items ordered. 程式碼範例也會建立`SimpleOrderChangedEventArgs`類別包含事件資訊，以及列舉來識別變更的類型。The code example also creates a `SimpleOrderChangedEventArgs` class to contain the event information, and an enumeration to identify the type of change. 程式碼範例示範自訂行為藉由在呼叫的屬性和方法在衍生類別`Main`方法`Demo`類別。The code example demonstrates the custom behavior by calling the properties and methods of the derived class, in the `Main` method of the `Demo` class. 這個程式碼範例會使用不可變的索引鍵的物件。This code example uses objects with immutable keys. 程式碼範例會使用可變動的金鑰，請參閱。For a code example that uses mutable keys, see . [!code-cpp[KeyedCollection2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollection2/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[KeyedCollection2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollection2/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[KeyedCollection2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollection2/vb/source.vb#1)] 範例 2Example 2 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫的受保護方法，以支援可變動索引鍵，以及如何覆寫的受保護， ， ，和方法來維護索引鍵的完整性和集合中。The following code example shows how to override the protected method to support mutable keys, and how to override the protected , , , and methods to maintain the integrity of the keys and the collection. 程式碼範例會建立`MutableKeys`集合，衍生自，而`MutableKey`類別。The code example creates the `MutableKeys` collection, which derives from , and the `MutableKey` class. `MutableKey`類別具有可設定`Key`屬性。The `MutableKey` class has a settable `Key` property. 新的金鑰是指派給屬性時，會呼叫屬性 setter `internal` (`Friend`在 Visual Basic 中)`ChangeKey`方法來測試是否與現有的索引鍵衝突的新索引鍵的集合。When a new key is assigned to the property, the property setter calls the `internal` (`Friend` in Visual Basic) `ChangeKey` method of the collection to test whether the new key would conflict with an existing key. 如果是的話，會擲回例外狀況，且屬性值不會變更。If so, an exception is thrown and the property value is not changed. 為了維護之間的連線`MutableKey`物件和`MutableKeys`集合，並防止物件被插入兩個集合`MutableKey`類別具有`internal`(`Friend`在 Visual Basic 中) `Collection`欄位。In order to maintain the connection between a `MutableKey` object and the `MutableKeys` collection and to prevent an object from being inserted into two collections, the `MutableKey` class has an `internal` (`Friend` in Visual Basic) `Collection` field. 這個欄位由受保護的方法，提供自訂行為中新增和移除項目集合，例如維護方法。This field is maintained by the protected methods that provide custom behavior for adding and removing items from the collection, such as the method. 項目加入至集合中，移除項目時，清除時，會設定欄位。The field is set when the item is added to a collection and cleared when the item is removed. [!code-csharp[KeyedCollectionMutable#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollectionMutable/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[KeyedCollectionMutable#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollectionMutable/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void SetItem (int index, TItem item);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void SetItem(int32 index, !TItem item) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub SetItem (index As Integer, item As TItem)
protected: override void SetItem(int index, TItem item);

param.name: index
param.span: The zero-based index of the item to be replaced.

span.span: The zero-based index of the item to be replaced.
The new item.

summary.span: Replaces the item at the specified index with the specified item.

span.span: Replaces the item at the specified index with the specified item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 查閱字典會一併更新。The lookup dictionary is updated accordingly. 也就是說，查閱字典中，已移除的金鑰已被取代的項目，並加入新項目的索引鍵。That is, the key of the item that is being replaced is removed from the lookup dictionary, and the key of the new item is added. 這個方法是一種 o （1） 運算。This method is an O(1) operation. ## 實作者注意事項Notes for Implementers 覆寫這個方法以提供自訂的設定的行為屬性繼承自泛型類別。Override this method to provide customized behavior for setting the property inherited from the generic class. > [!NOTE] > 這個方法不會影響行為屬性，這是唯讀狀態。This method does not affect the behavior of the property, which is read-only. 呼叫這個方法，設定基礎集合中的項目，並更新查閱字典的基底類別實作。Call the base class implementation of this method to set the item in the underlying collection and to update the lookup dictionary. ## Examples 本章節包含兩個程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法以提供自訂設定的行為屬性。This section contains two code examples that demonstrate overriding the method to provide custom behavior for setting the property. 第一個範例會加入自訂通知事件，第二個物件的集合提供支援可變動索引鍵。The first example adds a custom notification event and the second provides support for a collection of objects with mutable keys. 範例 1Example 1 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫的受保護， ， ，和方法，以提供的自訂行為， ，和方法，以及設定預設屬性 （C# 中為索引子）。The following code example shows how to override the protected , , , and methods, to provide custom behavior for the , , and methods, and for setting the default property (the indexer in C#). 在此範例中提供的自訂行為是名為將通知事件`Changed`，其引發的每個覆寫方法的結尾。The custom behavior provided in this example is a notification event named `Changed`, which is raised at the end of each of the overridden methods. 程式碼範例會建立`SimpleOrder`類別，衍生自代表簡單的訂單。The code example creates the `SimpleOrder` class, which derives from and represents a simple order form. 訂購表單包含`OrderItem`物件代表的項目排序。The order form contains `OrderItem` objects representing items ordered. 程式碼範例也會建立`SimpleOrderChangedEventArgs`類別包含事件資訊，以及列舉來識別變更的類型。The code example also creates a `SimpleOrderChangedEventArgs` class to contain the event information, and an enumeration to identify the type of change. 程式碼範例示範自訂行為藉由在呼叫的屬性和方法在衍生類別`Main`方法`Demo`類別。The code example demonstrates the custom behavior by calling the properties and methods of the derived class, in the `Main` method of the `Demo` class. 這個程式碼範例會使用不可變的索引鍵的物件。This code example uses objects with immutable keys. 程式碼範例會使用可變動的金鑰，請參閱。For a code example that uses mutable keys, see . [!code-cpp[KeyedCollection2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollection2/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[KeyedCollection2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollection2/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[KeyedCollection2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollection2/vb/source.vb#1)] 範例 2Example 2 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫的受保護方法，以支援可變動索引鍵，以及如何覆寫的受保護， ， ，和方法來維護索引鍵的完整性和集合中。The following code example shows how to override the protected method to support mutable keys, and how to override the protected , , , and methods to maintain the integrity of the keys and the collection. 程式碼範例會建立`MutableKeys`集合，衍生自，而`MutableKey`類別。The code example creates the `MutableKeys` collection, which derives from , and the `MutableKey` class. `MutableKey`類別具有可設定`Key`屬性。The `MutableKey` class has a settable `Key` property. 新的金鑰是指派給屬性時，會呼叫屬性 setter `internal` (`Friend`在 Visual Basic 中)`ChangeKey`方法來測試是否與現有的索引鍵衝突的新索引鍵的集合。When a new key is assigned to the property, the property setter calls the `internal` (`Friend` in Visual Basic) `ChangeKey` method of the collection to test whether the new key would conflict with an existing key. 如果是的話，會擲回例外狀況，且屬性值不會變更。If so, an exception is thrown and the property value is not changed. 為了維護之間的連線`MutableKey`物件和`MutableKeys`集合，並防止物件被插入兩個集合`MutableKey`類別具有`internal`(`Friend`在 Visual Basic 中) `Collection`欄位。In order to maintain the connection between a `MutableKey` object and the `MutableKeys` collection and to prevent an object from being inserted into two collections, the `MutableKey` class has an `internal` (`Friend` in Visual Basic) `Collection` field. 這個欄位由受保護的方法，提供自訂行為中新增和移除項目集合，例如維護方法。This field is maintained by the protected methods that provide custom behavior for adding and removing items from the collection, such as the method. 項目加入至集合中，移除項目時，清除時，會設定欄位。The field is set when the item is added to a collection and cleared when the item is removed. [!code-csharp[KeyedCollectionMutable#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollectionMutable/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[KeyedCollectionMutable#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollectionMutable/VB/source.vb#1)]
